sentence.Network_en: It all depends on how heavy-handed you are with the paprika.

sentence.Network_en: I order black pepper sirloin without any paprika.

sentence.Network_en: I always add some paprika for extra flavour.
sentence.Network_cn: 我总是加一些辣椒粉来提味儿。

entry.def: Paprika is a red powder used for flavouring meat and other food.

means.word_mean: 1. plant bearing large mild thick-walled usually bell-shaped fruits; the principal salad peppers
2. a mild powdered seasoning made from dried pimientos
